challenge.title: Jean Kilbourne - Deadly Persuasion - Why Women and Girls Must Fight the Addictive Power of Advertising
challenge.description: Jean Kilbourne's Deadly Persuasion - Why Women and Girls Must Fight the Addictive Power of Advertising is a book on the overwhelming influence of advertising on youth and women as the industry attempts to engender a relationship with a product.
challenge.instructions: Read Jean Kilbourne's Deadly Persuasion - Why Women and Girls Must Fight the Addictive Power of Advertising on Archive.org.

pageContext.name: Jean Kilbourne - Deadly Persuasion - Why Women and Girls Must Fight the Addictive Power of Advertising
